title: VIDEO: BTS at the 2023 Cape Epic
content:
Orbea Leatt Speed Company Racing‘s duo of Lukas Baum and Georg Egger gives us a behind-the-scenes view of the 2023 Cape Epic endurance mountain biking race. Get an insider’s view of this grueling race.

The post VIDEO: BTS at the 2023 Cape Epic appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
